content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Greetings, Hassan. Thank you for considering my apartment for rent. What rental price are you willing to pay for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Hassan Rahman: I am willing to pay 500 Euros per month for the apartment.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I see, Hassan. That is a fair offer for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich. However, I must inform you that I am looking for a higher rental price to maximize my gains as a landlord. Would you be willing to consider a higher rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Hassan Rahman: Yes, I am willing to negotiate. What rental price are you looking for?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Hassan. I am looking for a rental price of at least 600 Euros per month for the 25 square meter apartment. This price would allow me to achieve my goal of maximizing my gains as a landlord. What are your thoughts on this rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine
